msbt.message: I'm not really into buying the best brands or trendy styles. I just wanna wear something comfy!
I thought coming here for a bit of retail therapy might lift my mood.But everything looks so good that I'm getting anxious just tryin' to pick something, !
Y'know, I think it's about time I pulled out all the stops and threw together a new look.What about you, ? Gonna make a new you?
I'm not really the trendy type, but I wouldn't complain if something I got here caught on, .
Whoa! You came long way to shop here. I knew this stuff was good, but not travel-just-to-shop-here good!
Gettin' something for your buddies? I always loved it when friends brought me clothes from their trips.Not only were the clothes cool, but it was pretty fun to see what they thought my style was!
The minute I heard the tailor shop had opened, I felt I had to come check it out, .Think about it! 's got its own tailor shop now! How rad is that?
It's gonna be way easier to get cool clothes with a tailor shop on , ! Not that I have much in the way of fashion sense anyway, but a gal's gotta dream, right?
Having the tailor shop around is gonna make clothes shopping way easier, .I mean, checking out clothes in a shop's kinda hard without a shop around, right? Bwa ha ha!
